data.prayer: Father, move the 343,721 believers in the state of British Columbia to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of British Columbia, Canada
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of British Columbia, Canada.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 12 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of British Columbia, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Father, help the 343,721 believers in British Columbia to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 4,070,278 lost friends and neighbors.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Tatar people might believe through him.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of British Columbia.
Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of British Columbia, Canada.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.section_summary:
the state of British Columbia, Canada has a population of 4,414,000.

We estimate British Columbia has 343,721 people who might know Jesus, 2,798,202 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,272,076 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 12 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of British Columbia to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

location.name: British Columbia
